text: Waseda University Senior High School is a high school in Japan, located in Tokyo. It was founded in 1920 as a high school affiliated to Waseda University. Its motto is ., which is the same motto as for Waseda University. ==Related books== * 早稲田大学高等学院編『三十周年記念誌 : 1979』(Japanese), published in 1980 * 早稲田大学高等学院編『継承そして創造 : 五十年の軌跡-未来に向けて』 (Japanese), published in 1999 * 早稲田大学高等学院米式蹴球部OB会編『半世紀の道のり : 早稲田大学高等学院米式蹴球部50年史』(Japanese), published in 2000 ==External links== * Waseda University Senior High School Category:High schools in Japan Category:High schools in Tokyo Category:Boys' schools in Japan Category:Educational institutions established in 1920 Category:Private schools in Japan Category:Waseda University
title: Waseda University Junior and Senior High School
